sources.title: Housewife Herman (1938)
sources.description: Herman, a fat pig-man with a Herman Bing voice. He trades jobs with his wife and finds that cooking and taking care of kids is too difficult for a mere male. He concedes this to his wife, after the house has become a broken, wet shambles. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/housewife-herman-1938/

metadata.Plot: Herman, a fat pig-man with a Herman Bing voice. He trades jobs with his wife and finds that cooking and taking care of kids is too difficult for a mere male. He concedes this to his wife, after the house has become a broken, wet shambles.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
